masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "The Mega-Sorter 9000 has gone haywire! It's launching presents through the roof at 200 mph! There's wrapped boxes raining down on the city! Someone's going to get hit by a PlayStation! We can't shut it down from hereâ€”the controls are INSIDE the machine!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Enter the machine and shut it down from inside
  • Catch or redirect falling presents before they hurt someone
  • Figure out what caused the malfunction
